person.persName: John Wils Boyd (Christian County, Kentucky, farmer and butcher)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer and butcher. Kentucky native. Son of John W. Boyd and Mary Boyd. Married to Frances E. Wooten Boyd in Christian County, Kentucky, on November 25, 1855. Married to to Virginia Bowles Boyd in Christian County on June 1, 1857. Father of James Boyd and Edward Boyd. Student in Christian County in 1850. Farmer and butcher in Christian County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Christian County in 1860. Farmer in Christian County in 1863.
